description: Submission of details pursuant to conditions 5 (Cycle storage facility), 8 (Landscaping) and 10 (Management plan) of planning permission 16/14486/FUL
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the conditions, as noted above, are discharged.

Any parking that cannot be contained within the site must park considerately and safely, so as not to obstruct sightlines at junctions or site accesses. The applicant should be aware that any such parking will cause unnecessary concern and agitation within the local community.
Please be advised that we require scaled plans and elevation, both existing and proposed, ar a scale of 1:50 or 1:100

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Works both appropriate and necessary for reasons of health and safety. The removal of the dead sycamore will not invoke a replacement in this instance due to the difficulty of achieving a replacement planting in the location.Recommendation:Approve.
